Package bitstrings

Provides the classes necessary to specify a satisfiability problem involving bitstrings.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBitStringGraph  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayListSet<E>
    Works just like java.util.ArrayList, except it will refuse to add an element if it is equal to an element already appearing in the ArrayListSet.
    BitString
    An array of fixed length of IBooleanVariables.
    BitStringAlternator
    Constrains a BitString so that adjacent bits are negations of each other.
    BitStringAnder
    Constrains the IBitString Z to be the bitwise AND of IBitString X and IBitString Y.
    BitStringBitFixer
    Constrains the IBooleanVariable at position bit of IBitString b to equal the boolean value val.
    BitStringClearer  
    BitStringConcatenator  
    BitStringEqualizer  
    BitStringExchanger  
    BitStringFixer  
    BitStringGraph  
    BitStringHighPopper  
    BitStringLowPopper  
    BitStringNoter  
    BitStringOrderer  
    BitStringOrer  
    BitStringSetter  
    BitStringSubstringer  
    BitStringUnequalizer  
    BitStringXorer  
    BitStringZerothBitFixer  

Package bitstrings Description

Provides the classes necessary to specify a satisfiability problem involving bitstrings.
Since:
2005/10/27
